description: Boxwood (Buxus microphylla 'Green Pillow') is an amazing plant species with a dense, compact moss-like foliage, mounding growth habit, and bright green color. Ideal for an evergreen hedge, topiary, or container gardening, its slow growth rate and low-maintenance water needs make it an ideal choice for gardeners who want a consistent, attractive landscape feature. The plant's ability to adapt to a variety of soil and light conditions ensures it will thrive in almost any outdoor space. It's an excellent choice for both formal and informal gardens, offering a touch of elegance wherever it's planted.
